data.name: Guat granted Sp Hon
data.desc: Martín Carlos de Mencos appointed Gov of Guat, and ordered to protect southern half of Hon, thereby transferring jurisdiction of this territory from Yuc to Guat
data.note:
Real Cedula en Md. a 5 de abril de 1658 / Arrives at Santiago de Guat on 6 Jan 1659 /
 Possibly first [non-conquistador] military Pres of Guat = Martin Carlos de Mencos /v Garcia P 2 94, 206
